import "./main.css" import { Button } from "react-bootstrap" import axios from "axios" import { useRef } from "react" export default function Main() { const email = useRef(); const firstname = useRef(); const lastname = useRef(); const password = useRef(); const phone = useRef(); const companyname = useRef(); const domain = useRef(); const handleClick = async () => { const newAccount = { email: email.current.value, firstname: firstname.current.value, lastname: lastname.current.value, password: password.current.value, phone: phone.current.value, companyname: companyname.current.value, domain: domain.current.value, } await axios.post("http://localhost:8800/api/create", newAccount); } return (
